PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08332022-06-24,  ,  PSPC,  NCC,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectLease with the Ottawa-Carleton Association for Persons with Developmental Disabilities (OCAPDD) and ilver Spring Farm, as the indemnifier ** NCC **
PrecisOrder approving that National Capital Commission grant four options to extend the lease with OTTAWA-CARLETON ASSOCIATION FOR PERSONS WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES and SILVER SPRING FARM, as the indemnifier, for a period of five years each, beginning on November 1, 2023, November 1, 2028, November 1, 2033, and November 1, 2038, for real property located at 1701, 1703, 1705, 1723 and 1725 Robertson Road, in Ottawa, Ontario.
AttachmentsAttachment
